name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
schedule:
1. Overview
2. How cells work
3. Major metabolic pathways
4. Enzyme kinetics (part 1)
5. Enzyme kinetics (part 2)
6. How cells grow (part 1)
7. How cells grow (part 2)
8. Stoichiometry of microbial growth and product formation
9. Exam 1
10. Selection and scale-up of bioreactors
11. Operation and control of bioreactors
12. Recovery and purification of products (part 1)
13. Recovery and purification of products (part 2)
14. Recovery and purification of products (part 3)
15. Animal cell cultures
16. Literature discussion
17. Literature discussion
18. Final exam
materials: Bioprocess Engineering, Basic concepts by Shuler and Kargi, 2nd ED
